# Eva Gorobets Photography

> Executive portraits, corporate events, and art-world photography based in Tokyo.

## About
- Website: https://evagorobets.com
- Photographer: Eva Gorobets
- Base: Tokyo, Japan
- Also works in: Melbourne, Australia and international assignments
- Languages: English, Japanese, Russian

- Typical response time: within 24 hours
